mapper.select: select a.post_id postId, a.title title, a.description description, a.content_mkd contentMkd, a.content_html contentHtml, b.username username, c.school_name schoolName from tb_post a left join tb_user b on a.user_id = b.user_id left join tb_school c on a.school_id = c.school_id where a.is_delete = 0 and post_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update tb_post set is_delete = 1 where post_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(1) from tb_comment where post_id = #{postId}
select count(1) from tb_post_grade where type = 1 and post_id = #{postId};
select count(1) from tb_post_grade where type = 0 and post_id = #{postId};
mapper.delete: delete from tb_post_grade where type=#{type} and user_id=#{userId} and post_id = #{postId}
mapper.select: select post_id postId,type type from tb_post_grade where user_id = #{userId}
